code: import{Navigate}from"react-router-dom";import React from"react";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function SignUp(props){const[redirect,setRedirect]=React.useState(false);async function handleSubmit(e){e.preventDefault();const formData=new FormData(e.target);const[username,password]=[formData.get("username"),formData.get("password")];try{const res=await fetch("".concat(process.env.REACT_APP_SERVER_URL,"/signup"),{method:"POST",headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json"},body:JSON.stringify({username,password})});const data=await res.json();if(!res.ok){alert(data.error);return;}alert("successful sign up!");props.setUsername(data.username);setRedirect(true);}catch(e){alert(e.message);}}if(redirect){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Navigate,{to:"/"});}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,className:"login-form",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"username",placeholder:"username",name:"username",required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"password",placeholder:"password",name:"password",required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Sign Up"})]});}
